body:
$!There are 5 things you need to do when employing staff for the first time.$!

s1. **Decide how much you need to pay someone:** you must pay your employee at least the [National Minimum Wage (NMW)](/your-right-to-minimum-wage "the National Minimum Wage").
s2. **Check if someone can legally work for you:** you need to check if they have the [legal right to work in the UK](/legal-right-to-work-in-the-uk "Legal right to work in the UK tool"). You may have to do other employment [checks](/checks-on-job-applicants "checks on job applicants") as well.
s3. **Get employment insurance:** you need employers’ liability insurance as soon as you become an employer. It must cover you for at least £5 million and come from an ['authorised insurer'](http://www.fsa.gov.uk/register/home.do "find an authorised insurer"){:rel="external"} - you can find one online.
s4. **Register with HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC) and pay your employee:** you need to [register as an employer,](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/paye/intro/register.htm "Register as an employer"){:rel="external"} make any [deductions](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/paye/payroll/day-to-day/paying.htm "Deductions"){:rel="external"} (ie PAYE and National Insurance contributions (NICs)) and give a [pay statement](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/paye/payroll/day-to-day/paying.htm#2 "Pay statement"){:rel="external"} to your employee.  
s5.  **Send details of the job (including terms and conditions) in writing to your employee:**  if you’re employing someone for more than a month, you need to give them a [written statement of employment](/employment-contracts-and-conditions/written-statement-of-employment-particulars "Written statement of employment particulars") within their first 2 months.  


$D [Download 'Template for a written statement of employment' (PDF, 628KB)](http://www.businesslink.gov.uk/Employing_People_files/Written_Statement.pdf "Download 'Template for a written statement of employment (PDF, 628KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

Read the HMRC booklet below for advice on taking on your first employee. 

$D
[Download 'Thinking of employing someone?' (PDF, 541KB)](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/employers/employing-someone.pdf "Download 'Thinking of employing someone?' (PDF, 541KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

*[NICs]:  National Insurance Contributions
*[NMW]:  National Minimum Wage
*[Acas]:  Advisory,Conciliation and Arbitration Service
*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs
*[PAYE]: Pay As You Earn
overview: The main things you need to consider when hiring an employee for the first time or if you've never hired an employee before
title: Employing staff for the first time
